member.name: ID2D1TransformedGeometry.GetSourceGeometry
member.summary: Retrieves the source geometry of this transformed geometry object.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a pointer to the source geometry for this transformed geometry object. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

member.name: ID2D1TransformedGeometry.GetTransform
member.summary: Retrieves the matrix used to transform the object's source geometry.
member.param: A pointer that receives the matrix used to transform the object's source geometry. You must allocate storage for this parameter.

member.name: ID2D1TransformedGeometry
member.summary: Represents a geometry that has been transformed.
